Chief Data Officer

I have an exciting piece of news to share in this post. As of today, I have been named the City of Syracuse’s first Chief Data Officer. I’ll continue working on the Innovation Team, but will also be able to define my role and expand my reach.

The job will likely center on the following tasks: * Create policies and process around how to deal with the data that currently exists * Centralize data or at least make it accessible to the appropriate departments * Promote sharing data and talk a lot about why using data to make decisions is important * Engage the public in learning about the data the city collects and eventually providing the data (where appropriate) to the public * Build partnerships with organizations in Syracuse to use city data for projects

More on what I’ll be doing here. I’ll be posting more on my progress here as well!
